name: Secret Mission (itch) (Polnsumi)
description:
Secret Mission is third person shooting game that want player to role as the Agent that have to success the mission no matter what coming in their way.

This game has 2 mission 

1.Go into the lab and get the ancient treasure the has been kept in the room

2.Escape from the lab.

Short Story

Agent name Jack receive a mission form clients that has to steal an ancient treasure that has been kept at the lab . Can he accomplished his mission?

Group Member

How to control?

W = Walk and rotate camera forward.

S = Walk and rotate camera backward.

A = Walk and rotate camera left.

D = Walk and rotate camera right.

Left Click = Fire

Caution!!

When you walk backward or in backward rotation every movement will be inverted.

Such as  when you walk backward if you want to turn left you have to press "D"

You can play it in Browser version By click on this "Play Game".

Or you can download for PC version.

We hope you enjoy our game Project . Feel free to comment. We will read it all. And don't  forget to rate our game. 

Thank you
